column4: can anyone clarify something for me? I read on slashdot that feisty wouldn't have the 3d accelerated drivers by default for nvidia / ati for beryl / AIGLX, does that mean that restricted-modules won't include the nvidia drivers anymore? or just that it won't be default?
it won't be default, as has been for ages already
(incidentally, "accelerated" != "proprietary"; many Radeons are accelerated with the free drivers already)
right, bad wording on my part.
